author: pbs.org
title: Indian Summers: Episode 5 Preview Masterpiece
text: In Episode 5, while Ralph confronts his conflicting feelings for Madeleine, both Aafrin and Ian face daunting new opportunities. Episode 5 of Indian Summers airs Sunday, October 25, 2015 at 9/8c on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #IndianSummersPBS
